<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14927</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Interviste di giovani europei</string>
            <string language="en">Interviews of young Europeans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interviews von jungen Europäern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entrevues de jeunes Européens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Entrevistas de Europeus novos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνεντεύξεις των νέων Ευρωπαίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entrevistas de europeos jóvenes</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questa attività è basata sulla comprensione orale: ascoltando alcune interviste sulla nozione di cittadinanza europea, i discenti scopriranno le idee ed i punti di vista di quattro giovani provenienti da diversi paesi europei.</string>
            <string language="en">This activity is based on aural comprehension: by listening to some interviews about the notion of European citizenship, learners will discover the ideas and points of views of four young people coming from different European countries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Cittadinanza</string>
            <string language="en">citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität basiert auf Ohrenerfassen: 
indem sie zu einigen Interviews über den Begriff der 
europäischen Staatsbürgerschaft hören, entdecken Anfänger die 
Ideen und die Punkte von Ansichten von vier jungen Leuten, die von den
unterschiedlichen europäischen Ländern kommen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité est basée sur la compréhension 
auditive : en écoutant quelques entrevues au sujet de la notion
de la citoyenneté européenne, les étudiants découvriront les 
idées et les points des vues de quatre jeunes venant de différents 
pays européens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade é baseada na compreensão aural: 
escutando algumas entrevistas sobre a noção do citizenship 
europeu, os learners descobrirão as idéias e os pontos das opiniões
quatro povos novos que vêm dos países europeus diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα είναι βασισμένη στην ακουστική 
κατανόηση: με το άκουσμα μερικές συνεντεύξεις για την 
έννοια της ευρωπαϊκής υπηκοότητας, οι αρχάριοι θα ανακαλύψουν 
τις ιδέες και τα σημεία των όψεων τεσσάρων νέων που προέρχονται 
από τις διαφορετικές ευρωπαϊκές χώρες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad se basa en la comprensión aural: 
escuchando algunas entrevistas sobre la noción de la 
ciudadanía europea, los principiantes descubrirán las ideas y las 
puntas de opiniones cuatro personas jóvenes que vienen de diversos 
países europeos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Staatsbürgerschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">citoyenneté</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπηκοότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciudadanía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">15-17</string>
            <string language="en">15-17</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Dopo aver ascoltato ogni intervista gli studenti faranno alcune attività  web-based,  quali esercizi di completamento, vero e falso, questionario a scelta multipla, risposte a qualche domanda sul tema della cittadinanza europea e dettato.</string>
            <string language="en">After listening to each interview the students will do some web-based activities such as cloze exercises, true and false, multiple choice questionary, answer some questions on the topic of European citizenship and do a dictation.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
